list.data: execute_query_array(" SELECT id, IF(is_outbox, `to`, `from`) header, IF(DATE(datetime)=DATE(NOW()), DATE_FORMAT(datetime,'%H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(datetime,'%d/%m/%y')) header_text, subject body, TRIM(CONCAT_WS(' ', CASE state_sent WHEN 1 THEN 'Sent' ELSE '' END, CASE state_error WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE 'Error' END, CASE WHEN is_outbox=1 AND state_sent=0 AND state_error='' THEN 'Unsent' ELSE '' END, CASE state_new WHEN 1 THEN 'New' ELSE '' END, CASE state_reply WHEN 1 THEN 'Reply' ELSE '' END, CASE state_forward WHEN 1 THEN 'Forward' ELSE '' END, CASE state_wait WHEN 1 THEN 'Wait' ELSE '' END, CASE state_spam WHEN 1 THEN 'Spam' ELSE '' END, CASE priority WHEN -1 THEN 'Low' WHEN 1 THEN 'High' ELSE '' END, CASE sensitivity WHEN 1 THEN 'Personal' WHEN 2 THEN 'Private' WHEN 3 THEN 'Confidential' ELSE '' END, CASE is_outbox+state_new+state_reply+state_forward+state_wait+state_spam+priority*10+sensitivity WHEN 0 THEN 'Read' ELSE '' END )) body_text, CASE WHEN state_error!='' THEN 'danger' WHEN state_spam=1 THEN 'danger' WHEN state_new=1 THEN 'success' WHEN state_wait=1 THEN 'primary' ELSE '' END body_class, CONCAT(SUBSTR(body,1,100),'...') footer, CASE WHEN files THEN files ELSE '' END footer_text, CASE WHEN files THEN 'paperclip' ELSE '' END footer_icon FROM app_emails WHERE 1 = 1 AND ".make_fulltext_query(get_data("json/search"), "emails", ["minsize" => 1, "default" => "1=1"])." AND ".check_sql("emails", "list")." ORDER BY ".get_data("json/order")." LIMIT ".get_data("json/offset").",".get_data("json/limit")." ")
